Package com.henrikhedberg.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferInputStream.Handler
    A handler that is called when the specified BufferInputStream has run out of bytes or has been asked to close itself.
    BufferOutputStream.Handler
    A handler that is called when the specified BufferOutputStream has buffered new bytes or has been asked to close itself.
    InputStreamHandler
    An interface to notify a handler that the specified InputStream has new bytes to be read.
    SelectorLoop.AcceptableHandler  
    SelectorLoop.ConnectableHandler  
    SelectorLoop.ReadableHandler  
    SelectorLoop.WritableHandler  
    TcpServerConnection.Handler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferInputStream
    An InputStream that contains an internal buffer to enable communication between thread boundaries.
    BufferOutputStream
    An OutputStream that contains an internal buffer to enable communication between thread boundaries.
    EchoTcpServer  
    SelectorLoop
    A loop around the Selector.
    TcpServer
    A simple base class for single-threaded TCP servers.
    TcpServerConnection
    An established TCP connection in TcpServer.
